import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CategoryService } from '../services/category.service'; import { Category } from '../models/category.model'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; @Component({ selector: 'app-categories-list', templateUrl: './categories-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./categories-list.component.css'] }) export class CategoriesListComponent implements OnInit { categories$?: Observable constructor(private categoryService: CategoryService){ } ngOnInit(): void { this.categories$ = this.categoryService.getAllCategories() } }
